divs: sighting detailsi went outside about 9:00 at night and for some reason something made me look up.then an object flew directly over my head.it was totally silent,no noise at all.it looked to be very large 2-3 hundred feet across.it looked like it but also looked like it was flying low or the size of it made it seem that way.it was triangle\boomerang shaped and the bottom was covered in dimmly lit lights that looked a dull reddish color.it was flying at a north to north west direction.i was only able to watch it for a few seconds 6-8 seconds.i imediatly came in and called my friend that lives north of town to see if he could see it.but the object was moving enough west to be out of his sight.to me it seemed like it was flying low.i watched one of your shows about 4 days ago.you animated a craft that someone else seen and it was almost exact to what i seen.i belive these to be some new kind of military craft.i konw what i seen.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hutchinson
